title: Giro d’Italia: From stage wins to cruel close-calls and pink jersey highs, how the North Americans fared
content:
Sepp Kuss helps Primož Roglič win again, Brandon McNulty hits highest highs, and Derek Gee is everyone's new working-class hero.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia: From stage wins to cruel close-calls and pink jersey highs, how the North Americans fared on Velo.
author: ahood
